A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I really liked the movie
The good action\, an interesting and unexpected story\, and the excellent game of Mark Hamill\, Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver.
The film has problems like Finn and Rose's story that was pretty boring\, and Rose and Snock's characters were not bad but rather boring.
But I still enjoyed the film very much. The problems do not change for me because they are only a small part of the film but in general it's a very good movie.
And for my taste this is the best movie of Star Wars since the Empire
Strikes Back
